Pull-up Progression.name: Scapular Pulls
Pull-up Progression.description: Hang from a bar and focus on pulling your shoulder blades down and together.

Pull-up Progression.name: Arch Hangs
Pull-up Progression.description: Hang from a bar and pull your chest up by engaging your back muscles.

Pull-up Progression.name: Negative Pull-ups
Pull-up Progression.description: Jump to the top position of a pull-up and slowly lower yourself down.

Pull-up Progression.name: Pull-ups
Pull-up Progression.description: Standard pull-ups with full range of motion.

Squat Progression.name: Assisted Squat
Squat Progression.description: Perform a squat while holding onto a support for balance.

Squat Progression.name: Squat
Squat Progression.description: Standard bodyweight squat with arms extended forward.

Squat Progression.name: Split Squat
Squat Progression.description: Perform a squat with one leg forward and one back.

Squat Progression.name: Shrimp Squat
Squat Progression.description: Single-leg squat with the non-working leg held behind you.

Dip Progression.name: Parallel Bar Support Hold
Dip Progression.description: Hold yourself up on parallel bars with arms straight.

Dip Progression.name: Negative Dips
Dip Progression.description: Start at the top position of a dip and slowly lower yourself down.

Hinge Progression.name: Romanian Deadlift
Hinge Progression.description: Hinge at the hips while keeping legs mostly straight.

Hinge Progression.name: Single-Legged Deadlift
Hinge Progression.description: Romanian deadlift performed on one leg.

Hinge Progression.name: Nordic Curl
Hinge Progression.description: Lower yourself from a kneeling position using only your hamstrings.

Row Progression.name: Vertical Rows
Row Progression.description: Rows performed with body nearly vertical (easier angle).

Row Progression.name: Incline Rows
Row Progression.description: Rows performed with body at an incline.

Row Progression.name: Horizontal Rows
Row Progression.description: Rows performed with body horizontal to the ground.

Push-up Progression.name: Vertical Push-up
Push-up Progression.description: Push-up performed against a wall (nearly vertical position).

Push-up Progression.name: Incline Push-up
Push-up Progression.description: Push-up performed with hands on an elevated surface.

Push-up Progression.name: Diamond Push-up
Push-up Progression.description: Push-up with hands close together forming a diamond shape.

Push-up Progression.name: Pseudo Planche Push-up
Push-up Progression.description: Push-up with hands positioned further down by your hips.

Anti-Extension.name: Plank
Anti-Extension.description: Standard plank position, maintaining a straight body.

Anti-Extension.name: Ring Ab Rollout
Anti-Extension.description: Using rings to roll out, challenging your core stability.

Anti-Rotation.name: Banded Pallof Press
Anti-Rotation.description: Press a resistance band away from your body while resisting rotation.

Extension.name: Reverse Hyperextension
Extension.description: Lie face down and lift your legs behind you.

Extension.name: Arch Raises
Extension.description: Lie face down and lift both arms and legs simultaneously.

Extension.name: Superman
Extension.description: Advanced version of arch raises with longer hold times.
